Article.ArticleTitle: Laboratory scale medicinal plants mediated green synthesis of biocompatible nanomaterials and their versatile biomedical applications.

AbstractText: Nanoparticles and its green synthesis with plants have become an important field of nanoscience due it is great benefits provided to humanity through it and its cost effective, least harm to humans and the environment also, it offering a lot of application in biomedical research, diagnostics, and medicine as well as, drug manufacturing, improvement, or drug discovery. In this work, I focused on green synthesis nanoparticles with antioxidant involve in plants and the method for preparing them also the factors on which the extraction process depends on, spectroscopic techniques like UV-Visible, (TEM), (XRD), (IR), (EDX), (SEM), (HPLC), and zeta potential are use here.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Chemistry, Faculty of Science, Taibah University, P.O. Box 30002, Al-Madinah Al-Munawarah 14177, Saudi Arabia.
